General.Name: Guilin Seamild Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Guilin Seamild Foods Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and management of oat cereal health food products. It offers plain, organic, milk, cereal, fiber rye, wheat cerm, and quinoa mixed cereal oatmeal; red bean and coix seed, black sesame and mulberry, nuts, purple sweet potato and yam, and crispy oats; and oatmeal walnut powder, peptide oats dietary, and high-fiber oat bran under the Seamild brand. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Guilin, China.
